actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Act of 1974, relating to the New York Harbor collection and removal of drift project.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to authorize the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary for collection and removal of drift in New York Harbor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Act of 1974, relating to the New York Harbor collection and removal of drift project.
